---
title: "Using GitHub from my WSL Ubuntu"
format: html
---

```{shellscript}
#First, install GitHub on your WSL Ubuntu
# Updating the package list   
sudo apt update

# Installing Git
sudo apt install git -y

# Verifying the installation
git --version

# Configure the basic Git on Ubuntu
git config --global user.name "GitHub_user_name"
git config --global user.email "user@gmail.com"
git config --list
```
